General.Name: Suzhou Fushilai Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Suzhou Fushilai Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells biopharmaceutical products in China. It primarily focuses on manufacturing Alpha Lipoic Acid, L-Carnosine, and Phosphatidylcholine series of products. Its products are primarily used in medicines, dietary supplements, cosmetics, and other fields. The company also exports its products to Europe, America, Southeast Asia, and other countries. Suzhou Fushilai Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Changshu, China.
